descriptions.content: gtor ma cha gsum [TRBC T887] See also Offerings/Torma/Technical names/Obstructers. One part to the ten direction protectors, one part to the beings of the six realms, one part to the demons and obstructors. Ex: Rnal 'byor rgyud dang bya rgyud yan la thun mong du sbyar rung cha gsum gyi gtor chog mdor bsdus (W23974) (Specific to the Kriya and Carya Tantras)
